alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 9:04PM CDT until August 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CALLAHAN...NORTHWESTERN BROWN...COLEMAN... NORTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH...SOUTHEASTERN RUNNELS AND NORTHEASTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 903 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cisco to near Burkett to near Voss, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cross Cut around 915 PM CDT. Grosvenor around 920 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty around 925 PM CDT. Byrds, Rockwood, Waldrip and Lake Brownwood around 930 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Echo, Mozelle, Fisk, Thrifty, Us-283 Near The Coleman- Callahan County Line, Shields and Hords Creek Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels
